Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small BckAlgebra AllSmallBckAlgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic BckAlgebra of orders 2 to 7.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallBckAlgebra">
The output bckalgebra are represented by its operation table for *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small BckAlgebra
"IsASmallBckAlgebra" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic BckAlgebra of orders 2 to 7. It returns true if the model is a Small BckAlgebra, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallBckAlgebra">
